description:
Course Updated On : 02th Feb 2016

Join A community of 800+ Students trying to achieve ONE Task, TO BE A MATH GENIUS!

Top Vedic Math Course on Udemy!

Top Three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!

  1. You get lifetime access which comprises 3+ hours of new lectures with new sections to be added soon in 2015!
  2. I'll be at your disposal throughout this course so don't hesitate to ask me any doubts and you'll see me respond to every single one of them thoughtfully!
  3. What you will learn in this course is different Vedic Math tricks which will make you're life easy to breath and solve complex math problem right away!

Few Testimonials:

Stephen Willie says

“I Love Math"

Wow, if you love math then you'll love this course. It is absolutely amazing. Videos are straight forward and easy to follow. Discussions are there to help. Great course. Thank you

--Sagar Nath

"In just single line :) Love it!!"

I learned some very amazing math tricks, explained clearly. Thanks,

--Augustus Chin

"Great course"

I learned some new techniques and got the course at a reasonable price.

--Herman Bos

Good explanation

In this course you are guided in a good way when learning this method of arithmetic.

This course is meant for

Students who wants to get excellent grades & even get admission in their Dream college or to crack the aptitude test of a company

·Teachers looking to make their class interesting and more interactive with students

·Working professional in order to crack entrance/aptitude entrance exam

·To get the most out of this course the success MANTRA is "PRACTICE" once you get the trick you must try it for about 20-25times so that it gets very handy for you to apply.

This Covers Topics:

·Quick Multiplication of Binomials

·Quick Multiplication of Trinomials

·Quick Multiplication of Binomials X Trinomials

·Quick Multiplication of 2 x 2 Digit Nos.

·Quick Multiplication of 3 x 3 Digit Nos.

·Quick Multiplication of 4 x4 Digit Nos

·Quick Multiplication of 3 x 4 Digit Nos. & so on

·Quick Multiplication of N x N Digit Nos.

·Long Algebraic Divisions & Verifying the Answers

·Long Algebraic Divisions of the form (aX+C)

·Simultaneous Equations

·Finding Squares of 2 Digit Nos

·Finding Squares of 3 Digit Nos

·Multiply The no. 9999999 X 9999999 in Single Line

·Answer simultaneously (78976976 X 11) by the time the question is posted to you

·Finding the Fraction of a recurring decimal

And the unconditional, Udemy backed, 30 day money-back guarantee is not just any old guarantee, it's my personal promise to you that you will be a Math Genius ... just like my other Udemy students.

Thank you for learning more about my course and I hope what I share with you when you are enrolled in the course will prove helpful! Click on TAKE THIS COURSE now to get started!
title: Vedic Maths: My Every Student will be a Math Genius!
